titleStmt.title: A theological dialogue Wherin the Epistle of S. Paul the Apostle to the Romanes is expounded. Gathered and set together out of the readings of Antonie Corranus of Siuille, professor of Diuinitie.
Dialogus theologicus. English
titleStmt.author: Corro, Antonio del, 1527-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Purfoote, dwelling in Paules Churchyarde at the signe of the Lucrece,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Corro, Antonio de. Dialogus theologicus.
"The articles of the Catholike fayth which Antonie Coranus Spaniarde student of Diuinitie professeth, and alwayes hath professed .." has caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Paules Churchyarde at the signe of the Lucrece
